name: Die for Metal
desc:
They can't <input type="text" value="" data-result="stop" /> us
Let 'em <input type="text" value="" data-result="try" />
For heavy <input type="text" value="" data-result="metal" />
We will die!

Quit my <input type="text" value="" data-result="job" /> this morning said forever
I would hold my head up <input type="text" value="" data-result="high" />
Cause i need <input type="text" value="" data-result="metal" /> in my life
Just like an <input type="text" value="" data-result="eagle" /> needs to fly

So i walked outside into the <input type="text" value="" data-result="street" />
From a hall i heard <input type="text" value="" data-result="thunder" /> and screams
I walked <input type="text" value="" data-result="inside" /> so i could hear
and the guy beside me gave me a <input type="text" value="" data-result="beer" />

He had his <input type="text" value="" data-result="fist" /> up in the air
and called me <input type="text" value="" data-result="brother" /> said my friends
are over <input type="text" value="" data-result="there" />

They call themselves <input type="text" value="" data-result="immortals" />
They're the truest of the <input type="text" value="" data-result="true" />
And in that very <input type="text" value="" data-result="moment" />
I was <input type="text" value="" data-result="born" /> again like you

They said hold your head up <input type="text" value="" data-result="high" />
Raise your <input type="text" value="" data-result="fist" /> up in the air
Play metal <input type="text" value="" data-result="louder" /> than hell

They can't <input type="text" value="" data-result="stop" /> us
Let 'em <input type="text" value="" data-result="try" />
For heavy <input type="text" value="" data-result="metal" />
We would die!

Brothers stand beside me, theres a <input type="text" value="" data-result="battle" /> on
Know my <input type="text" value="" data-result="words" /> are true
There's a battle for <input type="text" value="" data-result="true" /> metal
They're <input type="text" value="" data-result="marching" />; they're <input type="text" value="" data-result="marching" /> on
me and you

Ten thousand <input type="text" value="" data-result="strong" /> are here tonight
With twenty thousand <input type="text" value="" data-result="fists" /> up in the air
The power of true metal's <input type="text" value="" data-result="calling" /> you
It's everywhere
